body: Single mothers are typically awful parents that's why she believed the other guy. Also she's a pretty terrible person in general but that's the story in a nutshell isn't it
That mother is the worse, she haven't even spoke to her son to hear his side of it, she just a sex  crazy milf
The mom on the first one is completely retarded. How can she even believed that, not even asking his son about it.
I wish someone translates the rest of it
$50 bucks says that her son either didn't put the other kid in the hospital or was the one being bullied.

Not bad. I was expecting incest in the first story. I don't really like blackmail or rape, but once the women started enjoying it, it go pretty hot. Hopefully this authors other works get translated soon.
Congratulation for your work here. I would be to know when you will continue the translation the others seasons?  Because the history is so intense and beauty.
